lines: 1. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,'Meuko nchwo monyor' amaiso;Yeso bwanchire nabagwenie inwe,'Maiso ain' aramokie, morore;Inchwo Yeso aba' okorora.
2. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,'Nchw' ebirem' as' omogweni'o bonsiManying' agaiteka abatorie,Naigw' okorangeria gw' ekeremaBono ngoet' are ase bonsi.
3. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,'Nchw' abataka namoigotigweNabarae inwe, nabaragerie,Yes' obachikire moigote'Nchwo Igor' as' ebiage bichire.
4. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,Inw' abamochi, moche asareTwabasoroire, mwanche rero iga,Moche bwango GakorangeriaInchw' abamochi, nomwanche Yeso.
